Reviews.Title: No mounting Template
Reviews.Author: R. connolly
Reviews.Content: I was a little disappointed with this product .The reason for this is that there was no mounting template in any of the boxes.It mentions that it comes with it on the outside of the box.So now,they're just sitting in my closet.I don't know how to mount them without one.I guess I should have sent them back but I threw out the delivery boxI just called the Company RTech and asked them to send me on.It's Sunday.....So I left a message.Hopefully they'll call me back and I'll give them a better rating.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price
Reviews.Author: Jack Ciallella
Reviews.Content: Pros: Lightweight, easily hung, look professional.Cons: Not weather-resistant, cheap plastic feel (mount out of reach), printed name brand on the front looks fake (can be removed).Basically, if you're going to put these in covered eves or in places that don't get wet or a lot of sun, can mount them high enough so that an "intruder" would have a difficult time checking their legitimacy... then they are a great choice.I am happy with my purchase and recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL J MULHERN
Reviews.Content: Three of my 5 units didn't even have the connections for the batteries, so they were completely useless. The 2 that were made correctly do work, however with this high of a failure rate buy something else.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased In the Product
Reviews.Author: Tyler Weir
Reviews.Content: This product looks exactly like the real thing. Completely worth the small cost and ships quickly. Will buy more from them when the time comes.
